full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/28/2023 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE EXECUTIVE OFFICE FOR IMMIGRATION REVIEW OFFICE OF THE IMMIGRATION JUDGE P. 0. BOX 2326 SAN FRANCISCO, CA 94126-2326 DATE: 11/27/90 A# 28 740 267 TO Marcelino John Romero RESPONDENT(S) IN DEPORTATION PROCEEDINGS NOTICE OF HEARING PLEASE TAKE NOTICE THAT THE ABOVE-CAPTIONED CASE WILL BE CONDUCTED BY AN IMMIGRATION JUDGE ON JANUARY 8, 1991 AT THE OFFICE OF THE IMMIGRATION JUDGE, ROOM 404, 630 SANSOME STREET, SAN FRANCISCO, CALIFORNIA 94111 AT 8:30 A.M. ( REGULAR MASTER / CUSTODY ). NOTE: YOU MAY BE REPRESENTED IN THIS PROCEEDING, AT NO EXPENSE TO THE GOVERNMENT, BY AN ATTORNEY OR OTHER INDIVIDUAL AUTHORIZED AND QUALIFIED TO REPRESENT PERSONS BEFORE AN IMMIGRATION JUDGE. IF YOU WISH TO BE so REPRESENTED, YOUR ATTORNEY OR REPRESENTATIVE SHOULD APPEAR WITH YOU AT THE HEARING. FAILURE TO APPEAR AT YOUR HEARING MAY RESULT IN ANY OR ALL OF THE FOLLOWING: 1. FORFEITURE OF YOUR BOND, 2. YOUR HEARING BEING HEARD IN YOUR ABSENCE UNDER SEC. 242(B) OF THE IMMIGRATION AND NATIONALITY ACT, 3. AN ORDER OF DEPORTATION BEING ENTERED AGAINST YOU, 4. ISSUANCE OF A WARRANT FOR YOUR ARREST AND DEPORTATION. I-485 / I-191 / I-256A / I-589 DUE BY . UPDATED/AMENDED I-589 DUE BY . CLERK, IMMIGRATION JUDGE georg goin OFFICE OF THE * served w/agency list. cc: Trial Attorney Continued for attach 0001N bjh/421
